statements: SELECT * FROM flood_prone_areas
SELECT area_name, city, state FROM flood_prone_areas ORDER BY state, city
SELECT area_id, area_name, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates FROM flood_prone_areas WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM flood_prone_areas WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY area_name DESC
SELECT area_id, area_name, ST_X(coordinates) AS longitude, ST_Y(coordinates) AS latitude FROM flood_prone_areas
SELECT * FROM flood_prone_areas WHERE state = 'California' AND city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT area_name, city, state FROM flood_prone_areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM flood_prone_areas WHERE city LIKE 'New%';
SELECT area_name, city FROM flood_prone_areas ORDER BY area_name ASC, city DESC;
SELECT area_id, ST_AsText(coordinates) AS coordinates FROM flood_prone_areas WHERE area_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE id = 1;
SELECT address, longitude FROM properties WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT area_name FROM flood_prone_areas WHERE area_id = 3;
SELECT address, longitude FROM properties ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT area_id, ST_AsText(area_polygon) FROM flood_prone_areas;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE id = 1;
SELECT address, latitude, longitude FROM properties WHERE latitude > 34.05 AND longitude < -118.25;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE address LIKE '%Park%';
SELECT area_name, ST_AsText(area_polygon) FROM flood_prone_areas WHERE area_id = 2;
SELECT id, address FROM properties ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM flood_prone_areas;
SELECT area_name, coordinates FROM flood_prone_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_location, risk_factor FROM property_details WHERE risk_factor > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM flooding_impacts WHERE area_id = 100;
SELECT impact_date, flood_depth FROM flooding_impacts WHERE flood_depth > 2.0 AND impact_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM flood_prone_areas
SELECT area_name FROM flood_prone_areas WHERE id = 1
SELECT property_name, property_location FROM property_details ORDER BY risk_factor DESC
SELECT impact_id, flood_depth, impact_date FROM flooding_impacts WHERE area_id = 2 AND property_id = 1
SELECT MAX(flood_depth) AS max_flood_depth, MIN(flood_depth) AS min_flood_depth FROM flooding_impacts
SELECT * FROM property_info;
SELECT property_name, property_address FROM property_info ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT property_address, property_name FROM property_info WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM flood_data WHERE flood_depth > 5.0;
SELECT property_id, SUM(damage_cost) AS total_damage_cost FROM property_damage GROUP BY property_id;
SELECT property_name, property_address FROM property_info WHERE property_location = 'City Center';
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_address, property_location FROM property_info WHERE property_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM flood_data WHERE flood_depth > 5.0 ORDER BY flood_id DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_address, assessment_date FROM property_info JOIN risk_assessment ON property_info.property_id = risk_assessment.property_id;
SELECT damage_id, property_id, damage_cost, repair_duration FROM property_damage WHERE damage_cost > 5000 ORDER BY repair_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM FloodProneAreas
SELECT area_name, risk_level FROM FloodProneAreas WHERE risk_level > 3
SELECT property_name, property_value FROM Properties ORDER BY property_value DESC
SELECT area_id, property_id, record_date FROM FloodRecords WHERE flood_level > 5
SELECT username, email, last_login FROM UserProfiles WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01'
SELECT area_name, location.STAsText() AS area_location, risk_level FROM FloodProneAreas WHERE risk_level > 3 ORDER BY risk_level DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_value, property_location.STAsText() AS location FROM Properties WHERE property_value > 100000 ORDER BY property_value DESC;

SELECT property_name, record_date, flood_level, area_name FROM Properties JOIN FloodRecords ON Properties.id = FloodRecords.property_id JOIN FloodProneAreas ON FloodRecords.area_id = FloodProneAreas.id WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY record_date;
SELECT id, property_name, risk_score, assessment_date FROM Properties JOIN RiskAssessment ON Properties.id = RiskAssessment.property_id WHERE risk_score >= 80 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT username, email, last_login FROM UserProfiles WHERE last_login < '2022-09-30' ORDER BY last_login DESC, username ASC;
